name: TheGreatOdin
0:
”Alexa, tell The Great Odin to summon the horn”
”Alexa, ask The Great Odin to play the horn”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the great odin
des: Summon your inner Norseman by asking The Great Odin to sound the Gjallarhorn! Skol Vikings!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
